name: Huggernaut
description:
HUGGERNAUT Controls:
  • A/D, Q/D or Arrow keys to run
  • Press and hold Left mouse button to use grappling hook
  • R to restart the current level
  • Enter to exit to the menu

In the platformer Huggernaut, you can't jump. But that's no big deal — not when you've got a GRAPPLING HOOK! And you're gonna make good use of it in your quest to HUG ALL YOUR FRIENDS~!

Features:
  • A very satisfying movement mechanic (hint: GRAPPLING HOOK)
  • BugsHugs!
  • Carefully tailored, custom physics
  • Colourful pixel art
  • Gravity-defying yellow orbs
  • 100% free!
